div.class: prose prose-xl mx-6 md:mx-auto text-center text-white

p.strong: Happy New Year! Full-day tickets are sold out for January 1st. Some half-day tickets are available.

div.p: Tickets are available for January 2, 3, and 4 - we expect to sell out soon.
XC Skiing and Snowshoe along with Tubing are available today!

div.class: button-row flex flex-col items-center justify-center sm:flex-row mt-4

404: Not Found
It's always the last place you look.
